Phil Nash on the Internet, Web Standards and Accessibility

About

Phil Nash

Phil Nash is a web developer at Mint Digital specialising in Ruby, Rails, HTML, JavaScript and CSS.

He also tweets a lot, plays rugby, loves music, drinks beer and codes in his spare time.

Unintentionally Blank

This site was set up as Phil started to learn web development and has a lot of his old code and opinions. You can now find more recent writing at philnash.co.uk or on Logical Friday.
